page.name: The Dread Dragonmaster
page.description: As you near the end of your Guardian training, Guardian Trainer Eckhard has asked you to pass the test of might by defeating Dragonmaster Frostscythe on his own turf.

properties.name: The Dread Dragonmaster
properties.description: As you near the end of your Guardian training, Guardian Trainer Eckhard has asked you to pass the test of might by defeating Dragonmaster Frostscythe on his own turf.
properties.complete: The icy power of the dragonmaster was no match for your might. Return to Guardian Trainer Eckhard to unlock your next Guardian ability.
